LanguageData.Mousekin_FurnitureWallCandle.label: Mousekin candle sconce
LanguageData.Mousekin_FurnitureWallCandle.description: A wall-mounted candle for lighting an area. Mousekins need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with candles. Does not produce heat.
LanguageData.Mousekin_FurnitureWallCandle_Frame.label: Mousekin candle sconce (building)
LanguageData.Mousekin_FurnitureWallCandle_Frame.descr: A wall-mounted candle for lighting an area. Mousekins need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with candles. Does not produce heat.
